entities.name: fred
entities.description: Fred is mentioned as a person who was holding hands with Ron, and his left buttock is said to have never been the same since Dad's anger.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as a person who was holding hands with Fred and witnessed Dad's anger.

entities.name: dad
entities.description: Dad is mentioned as a person who got angry when he found Ron and Fred holding hands.

entities.name: mum
entities.description: Mum is mentioned as someone Dad was as angry as, implying she has also been angry in the past.

relationships.description: Ron and Fred were holding hands when Dad found them, as mentioned by Ron.
Dad found Ron and Fred holding hands, which made him angry.
Dad got angry when he found Ron and Fred holding hands, as mentioned by Ron.
